name: Dragonsphere

files.goginstaller: N/A:Please select the GOG.com Linux installer

content:
files:
- goginstaller: N/A:Please select the GOG.com Linux installer
game:
  config_file: $GAMEDIR/dosboxDragonsphere.conf
  main_file: $GAMEDIR/dosboxDragonsphere_single.conf
installer:
- extract:
    dst: $CACHE/GOG
    file: goginstaller
    format: zip
- merge:
    dst: $GAMEDIR
    src: $CACHE/GOG/data/noarch/
- write_config:
    file: $GAMEDIR/dosboxDragonsphere.conf
    key: aspect
    section: render
    value: true
